Articles.Content:
Hello guys, I have created a lifter that is capable of lifting 300T's into space easily, even if a stage fails during the flight.

The Craft comes with a default load of 300T's of fuel but it can be easily edited to carry anything you can think. It requires a lot of staging however, so when flying be sure to keep an eye on the fuel tanks.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kerbalspaciersytem/
